website_summaries.verdict: This hugely popular tongue cleaner delivers a great balance of effective build-up removal and easy handling.
pros: Stainless steel head is curved for comfortable, gentle, and effective cleaning
Resistant to bacteria and easy to clean
Adjustable shape allows for better reach
Wide, textured rubber handles are easy to grip even when wet
Good quality from an established brand
cons: Rubber handles need to be dried properly to prevent mildew

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive the product as shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one-pack previously and it was effective for me and my tongue did feel cleaner. I recently purchased the two-pack expecting the same one as the picture advertised, but I received a different model. Instead of rubber grips and a narrow tip, the ones I just received has plastic grips and a wider tip. It feels cheaper and not as comfortable to use. Not sure if it is a newer/ older model or a knockoff. The only indication that it is "Dr. Tung's" is the little sticker on top of the box. Really disappointed and can't even make a return.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: This was not official Dr Tungs
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 2 previous Dr Tungs scrapers. This looks like and packaged like a Dr Tungs - but IS NOT! The edge was unfinished and has a serration similar to a dull saw! Oh, and accidentally cut my fingers. Avoid this vendor - they are selling you a fake from the Philippines (the return address packaged indicates) - it took 4 weeks to arrive! HOWEVER, I do highly recommend the Dr Tung Scrapers - I've been using it for several years now - a big change to my personal hygiene. Be sure to order the ono with PRIME availability.
customer_reviews.author: Pass-port in hand

customer_reviews.title: Counterfit Product
customer_reviews.text: I had an original Dr. Tung's cleaner for years to the point where the handles were starting to come apart and fall off. Ordered a replacement, and as I'm seeing with a lot of products on Amazon, it was a cheap counterfit from China (Dr. Tungs is not etched on it like the original) and the handles slip off every time I try to use it, which ironically is the whole reason I bought a new one to begin with!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Not what the picture looks like at ALL. Totally different one. I was buying it again to replace the one I have and it’s different than the photo. I pictured what my old one looks like & what it’s supposed to look like based on the photo on amazon vs what I got. I also tried to use it and it doesn’t even fit in a persons mouth, it’s super wide & it takes like ZERO gunk off the tongue. Total waste of money. It shipped from some place in Thailand and it’s a piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never knew I needed it until I needed it
customer_reviews.text: It's so disgusting what is on my tongue, so I love that this product helps clean it off. I value oral care, and this is something that is extremely valuable. Using a regular toothbrush doesn't seem to work well, and it induces a gag reflex that I try to avoid as much as possible. This product is also easy to sterilize, to hold, and it comes in a little bag to store/travel so it doesn't get contaminated. I'm very thankful for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: ehh
customer_reviews.text: I mean the idea is great and there is nothing wrong with this , the maker and seller did NOTHING wrong . from everything I have read and researched , this product is pretty much the best of the best and everyone always points back to this item when wanting a tongue scrapper . BUT!!! what I was wondering is why not make a tongue scrapper that can actually dig in your tongue a little . nothing aggressive ! but with this product its like cutting a stake with a butterknife .. why not put some little non aggressive teeth on there . ???
customer_reviews.author: oDinCyrene

customer_reviews.title: Worth It & I would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I love this tongue cleaner. It's not made cheap although I expected it to be because it's priced in an average price range. Quality is good. The little storage bag is great. The plastic handles/grips are awesome and this is so easy to use and gets everything in 2-3 swipes. I used to have a plastic scraper that I had to run over my tongue about 9-10 times. I'm extremely happy with this product. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a great tongue scrapper that's not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Office Admin

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective and inefficient
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a tool to clean your tongue is not as effective as simply using your toothbrush to clean your tongue. After 10 scrapes of the tool, whether you're scraping very lightly or with much force, your tongue is still not pink and still not clean. Same results after 20 scrapes. I ended up scraping off my taste buds and was unable to taste anything for a week, and my tongue STILL wasn't clean. Save your $5, and use your toothbrush which is WAY more effective and efficient 👌
customer_reviews.author: Alec Carlson

customer_reviews.title: You must use super gently or else it literally cuts your tongue
customer_reviews.text: After using this, my tongue started bleeding. You must use super gently or else it literally cuts your tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No sterile packaging
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived loosely packed in what's essentially a small baggie that you'd pack a snack in. It comes from China and maybe they have different standards for how something you're going to put in your mouth is packaged. That said, maybe I have too many First World Privilege issues, but I found the packaging to be disgusting and I threw the entire thing out. It looked like something you'd pick up at a garage sale. I wish I'd have taken a photo of how it arrived, but I didn't think about it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob From Springfield

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit.
customer_reviews.text: The product sold by YaptheS is counterfeit and doesn't match the product shown. The product I received came in a small plastic bag with no labeling and was a thin, U-shaped metal rod with thin blue rubber sleeves as "handles." There's even signs of discoloration on the rubber sleeves. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Wang

customer_reviews.title: It really helps with bad breath. Not to mention after using it your ...
customer_reviews.text: This item works amazingly. I was a little skeptical at first, but now I cannot go without it. It really helps with bad breath. Not to mention after using it your mouth feels so much cleaner. I am not sure how I made it this long without it. It is made of very good quality, and the color of it is nice as well. I am so glad I took the chance of purchasing it. It also comes with an adorable travel/storage bag which is a huge plus. I would definitely recommend this item to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Shammy777

customer_reviews.title: Cheers to being the 3000th reviewer!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews on here are hilarious :D mine won't be as amusing unfortunately. I really like this scraper; does the trick well. I didn't like how the rubber handles could slip right off, but a little waterproof gorilla glue fixed that. 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: John Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Never knew I needed
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I thought the edge of the scraper would have a sharpness. It doesn't- it's smooth and rounded. But it doesn't need to have a sharp edge in order to do the job. Who knew how much junk is on the back of your tongue? So much is back there contributing to bad breath and god knows what else. I use this once or twice a week, then simply rinse to clean. I'm trying to convince my partner to order one but he seems freaked out by the concept. I'll admit I was very skeptical at first as well, until I thought about how much more I could clean my mouth. Then I was hooked.
customer_reviews.author: KatyRose

customer_reviews.title: I'll never go back now!
customer_reviews.text: As some of the other reviewers mentioned, this works really well. I'm a good water-drinker, but I do love a sweet drink here and there, and I now use this scraper faithfully every night to remove the extra sugar. I'm a very careful brusher, and yet I still have residue on my tongue every day. After seeing that, I can't imagine NOT using it from now on. I'm going to buy one for my husband (and possibly my younger single brother--hey, what a stocking stuffer--HA!) My children's mouths are too small now, but I can see adding this to their repertoire down the road. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ccgirl

customer_reviews.title: Works well and doesn’t hurt!
customer_reviews.text: As a dental hygienist, I’m always interested in new products. I don’t care for the conventional plastic tongue cleaner that has the bristles on the other side and decided to give this a whirl. It’s a lot more effective than I expected for the fairly thick, dull blade. I think it works well and would definitely recommend it to my patients.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy S.

customer_reviews.title: Purple color not blue*.... - 1 star
customer_reviews.text: First time buying one of these. I read about it in a men’s health article. Said it was one of the things most men don’t use that is important. My mouth feels so much cleaner when I use it. Now as far as how this specific product compares to others, i don’t know. I took off a star because they sent me a purple one.. They should be more clear because I’d rather have got the blue color. Product functionality would be 5 stars. Brushing your mouth cannot clean nearly this well. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark nunya

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE FAKES
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE FAKES and do not work well or like the authentic Dr. Tung. Different shaped plastic and steel and no bag. Amazon should remove these or not call them Dr. Tung. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michele K

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for two years. It's my first tongue scraper, as I didn't know that was part of oral hygiene. I have nothing to compare it to, but it's worked well for me. I use it in the morning after breakfast, coffee, and brushing my teeth, and it gets the coffee "film" off. No signs of rust.
customer_reviews.author: laba

customer_reviews.title: This does exactly what it says it does!
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this both in the morning and at night after I have brushed my teeth and tongue with toothpaste. I run it over my tongue a few times, rinsing it with water in between each time. I have already noticed a difference in how my tongue feels and how long my fresh breath lasts. It's best to use it in one hand and it takes some practice not to make yourself gag. I recommend watching yourself do this in the mirror because if I look away, I go too far back and gag. Highly recommend for everyone to use this!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Eco-friendly
customer_reviews.text: I've used plastic tongue scrapers for years and decided to switch to this metal one to reduce waste. It's sturdy, gets the job done, and comes with a great travel pouch. It just doesn't seem to leave my mouth feeling as fresh as the plastic ones do. To be clear, this works great and leaves my mouth feeling great - but only 99% cleaner. The plastic ones make me feel 100% cleaner. The comparison between the two is what accounts for the 4 stars. This product is still super fantastic and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karbear

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this product!
customer_reviews.text: This tongue cleaner is amazing! After chemo treatments and tons of medication, my tongue has been affected. My tongue holds on to food colors and tastes, which makes my mouth feel unclean. I was brushing my teeth over 3 times a day to try and clean my mouth. I decided to try out a tongue cleaner, and boy am I happy. This gets off all the gunk and color that sticks on my tongue. Just using it makes my mouth feel so much cleaner. Extremely happy I found this product, absolutely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Sadly a no for me!
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing. I was browsing the internet and came across this and desired to buy it because of how amazing all the reviews were. OMG!! This destroyed my tongue. I’m pretty sure I went to hard but now I’m traumatized and will not try it again. To sharp and painful.
customer_reviews.author: Lulzek

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I had complaints from family that I had bad breath. After brushing, flossing, going to the dentist, mouth wash, breath mints, etc, I finally bought this as a last ditch effort and wow. Just wow. This stuff the first stroke pulled off so much gunk it was actually embarrassing but it WORKED. I could even feel the difference on my tongue. It's been great so far and there have been no more complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Leria DravenTop Contributor: Beauty and the Beast

customer_reviews.title: A little painful, does the trick though!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't really sure what to expect, but I'm glad I bought it. I use it every few days because I feel like my tongue doesn't gather enough gunk to use it twice a day. It's a little painful, so don't get overzealous when you try it out for the first time. You can always scrape harder, if you want. I haven't had any issues with molding, like others have mentioned, but I don't submerge the handles in water ever. I love the little pouch it comes with!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago I started to practice a better oral hygiene routine, but I could never clean my tongue efficiently. I learned about a tongue scraper and have been using it religiously ever since. It really helps to remove all the build up of food and debris from the day. It’s very easy to use and it’s easy to clean. I replace mine often because I like the feeling of a new scraper and it should be replaced as needed. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a great product that gets the job done effectively.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Love the handles
customer_reviews.text: Most other tongue scrapers are stainless steel and have the same basic shape, so they're all going to e easy to clean. Where this one stands out from the crowd are its handles. I like them because they enable me to scrape my tongue with just one hand; others you have to hold on with both hands, making this product slightly easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B

customer_reviews.title: Your Significant Other Will Thank You
customer_reviews.text: I'm a consistent brusher (morning and night) and brush my tongue every time. The first time I used this (after brushing) I couldn't believe everything that was left on my tongue. I would never show it to my husband because he'd never kiss me again. To get the best effect, slowly scrape it across your tongue and then along the sides. You'll be totally grossed out by the results.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wojcik

customer_reviews.title: OUR BREATH IS FRESH
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Ew! In a good way. This thing scraps off “unwanted” matter like a pro. I use it twice a day, especially after drinking coffee. Get the funk right out your tongue. My husband was skeptical at first, saying I’ll just brush my tongue. Well when he finally used it, I heard him yelling from the bathroom “that’s nasty!.” Bahaha! Get one!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I've used plastic but I love this one
customer_reviews.text: I've used plastic but I love this one. I use it daily a few times a day. It's east to clean as it is stainless steel and I love the rubber purple handles I got. I also love the free travel pouch. Cannot beat the price! I use Sonicare toothbrush and Oxfresh Lemon Mint toothpaste and mouthwash. They have a tongue scraper, but this one is way nicer and can be cleaned properly. Love it. Pretty pink tongue and the freshest of breath!
customer_reviews.author: C. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing and high quality product
customer_reviews.text: I. LOVE. THIS. high quality, super easy to clean, come with a cute little bag too if you travel with it! Just make sure to add a decent amount of pressure and make sure to try and get the entire tongue. I notice most of the gunk is at the very back.. dosent make you gag either.. at least for me! Buy one for your kids, educate them good hygiene for their mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Villanova

customer_reviews.title: YAY
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even begin to explain what a wonderful product this is. I’ve been trying to find a solution to my embarrassing bad breath. Honestly, this solved that. The amount of bacteria that was scraped off was disgusting— yet satisfying. Cleaning your tongue with your tooth brush is NOTHING compared to this. My tongue no longer has a film over it, it is now pink. It even seems like I can taste things better. I have already recommended this product to many friends. Plus, it comes with a carrying case. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for your mouth
customer_reviews.text: MY MORNING BREATH HAS DISAPPEARED SINCE BUYING THIS SCRAPER. Seriously, I use this at night after brushing my teeth before bed and it removes any staining from the day and instantly takes away any bad breath taste. I'd been debating buying a tongue scraper for a while and now that I have it, I'm so glad. For anyone concerned over color, I received purple.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: I don't really get the hype.
customer_reviews.text: So many reviews for this thing talk about it like it's the second coming of Jesus, but I don't get it. It's comfortable enough to use, but I didn't see much of a difference. I've used it a few times since then hoping for my personal miracle but it kind of, uh, just makes my tongue feel raw. I'm not mad about it but on a scale from one to fresh, I'd rate it frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good tongue cleaner, didn't find it any better than plastic.
customer_reviews.text: After reading so many amazing reviews, I needed to try out Dr. Tung's Tongue Cleaner. I've had a few plastic tongue scrapers, and was curious how this different design would be an improvement. It barely is. I've had similar results from plastic tongue scrapers. It does work well, but that is true of the others. (I've used  and  The important thing is to use pressure, go over your entire tongue, and clean well after use. I won't be getting rid of my other tongue cleaner, but it may go into my travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand this product. I have tried it a few times and I don’t see any difference or notice that it does anything besides slide my spit out of my mouth. I was excited for this but I either am using it wrong or am not seeing anything happening.
customer_reviews.author: sydney

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first to purchase this tongue cleaner. I had been using a tongue scraper that I purchased from Target. It was marginally effective. I couldn't really complain as I had nothing to compare it to. I saw this item on one of those "Best Things to Purchase from Amazon" and decided why not? Oh my goodness. The difference is night and day! I don't want to gross anyone out, but this is a MUST PURCHASE! Whoever made that list must have found Jesus after they used it as well. It comes with a travel pouch which makes storing it easy!
customer_reviews.author: L Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was fine, and it came exactly as expected (I got the pink one, but I wasn't picky about the color so that was fine). I've been using it for only a week so I can't say I see a ton of results yet, but will update my review after a few more weeks with the product. I do feel so far that there's less coating on my tongue, and it's definitely helping with my breath. Overall it's a pretty decent quality tongue scraper.
customer_reviews.author: coffeescripting

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I used this one time 4 days ago and my tongue is still extremely sore from it. It did clean my tongue but now I cant eat anything salty or spicy until it heals because it hurts too much. I will not use it again. My son however has not had a problem with using his.
customer_reviews.author: Slmalino

customer_reviews.title: Underrated device but use this with mouse wash after
customer_reviews.text: We've all been told to brush our tongue when brushing our teeth but nothing gets in there like this scraper. The worst thing about it for me is seeing all the nasty stuff come off your tongue and it leaves a bad taste in my mouth afterwards so I usually follow up with another brushing or using mouth wash afterwards. My dentist said it's great when people use this
customer_reviews.author: Carfo

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: This does not work. The scraping part has rounded edges so does not scrape anything at all. It is also large and does not bend easily. All in all, it did not work for my family and we returned the whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Not as gentle as a plastic scraper but still a great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good tongue scraper. I was used to the plastic ones and when it came to buy a new one I thought I’d give it a try. It’s more abrasive than than plastic ones and made my tongue a little sore for the following day or two but it gets the job done. I would recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect oral hygiene tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works terrific and is a good size. Fits the mouth well allowing for great functionality and the travel bag is convenient for packing in cosmetics bag for on the go! I swab mine w alcohol before and after traveling and frequently in between if it’s been awhile since packing up!
customer_reviews.author: D Farren

customer_reviews.title: Keep you mouth clean!
customer_reviews.text: I know it seems strange, everybody that I tell about it says that they just use their toothbrush to clean their tongue. This is a normal train of thought until you actually start using a tongue scraper. After the initial cleaning, you'll realize that your mouth feels much cleaner. If I go somewhere without my tongue scraper for a few days, I can feel my mouth getting less clean. It's a lot like floss. When you floss everyday, you don't realize how much cleaner your mouth is until you don't floss for a couple of days. Definitely get one of these! It is a great complement to total mouth care.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: In the past I have had plastic tongue scrapers but they always made me gag and eventually would get gross & start cracking. This tongue cleaner is fabulous, the handles are comfortable to grip, the stainless steel does a superior job cleaning compared to plastic ones, it does not make me gag when using it, and it cleans up nice. Added bonus it comes with a little travel case! High recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this - i never had a cleaner tongue!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome and came with a little travel bag as well to store it in and bring with you. It's amazing how clean my tongue feels after, it is so satisfying to use. It has definitely helped with bad breath as well. It's easy to use and i would recommend everyone to have this if they care about good hygiene
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty underwhelmed by the results for this, I guess my tongue was already pretty clean. It's well made, very sturdy and came with a nice cloth pouch to store it in. The metal doesn't bend or warp and it's easy to rinse off when you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: So Fresh and So Clean
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs to get one of these tongue cleaners. I use a waterpik and an electric toothbrush but adding this tongue cleaner makes my mouth feel so fresh. I have a peace of mind that my mouth is always fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: RaiderJuan

customer_reviews.title: Fresh breathe and doesn’t hurt
customer_reviews.text: I kept hearing about these toungue scrapers, and I have to say I was a bit afraid to try it. It’s stainless steel that you’re supposed to scrap across your toungue, it sounded painful. But nonetheless all the positive reviews convinced me to try it, not painful at all! It just feels like running your toungue across your teeth. I have incorporated this little tool into my morning and nightly routine and my breath feels way fresher!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Have been using it for the past week and it’s crazy to see how it actually works. Bought my boyfriend one as well because I loved it so much. It says it helps with bad breath and I’m not quite sure if it has helped but overall my mouth feels so much cleaner and I feel like foods taste much better again!! Spicy food is actually spicy again which I found very interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: This works for any kind of gunk accumulates on your tongue. The first time is always the best, if you keep up with cleaner, the remaining cleanings will be just catch ups. The first time take a good look at the color of your tongue, watches it gets pinker.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Spry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tongue cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tongue scraper because I lost my previous one that I had for over a year. I previously owned the long plastic one that looks similar to a toothbrush. This tongue scraper is totally different. And I have to say it is so much better! I think this steel tongue scraper does not even compare to the cheap plastic ones. It removes probably ten times the amount of yuck on my tongue than the old ones. This tongue cleaner is far superior to any others I have used. I love it!! It leaves my mouth feeling so much cleaner. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Works way better than other ones!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave about this product enough! I never realized how much I needed one of these! I used to buy the silicone ones from Walmart and I thought they were actually doing something but I was wrong. This one get everything!! It’s such a fascinating experience lol I went back and bought another one for my husband and he actually uses it whereas he never used his silicone one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: Get this is you have white on your tongue that's hard to get off!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST tongue cleaning method I've come across. Really gets the job done. The white on your tongue doesn't magically come off in one use, but over time there is a gigantic difference!! I would say my tongue is at least 80% cleaner than it used to be and probably more so if I dont skip a day. A lot of people probably don't need these and can use a toothbrush (like my husband) and have a perfectly pink tongue. But I was completely opposite and nothing worked until this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll love the results
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering this I read scores of reviews and decided to give it a go. I don't understand the people who were saying that it cut up their tongue after using it. What the heck were you guys doing? All you need to do is place it as far back on your tongue as you can go, add a little downward pressure and scrape toward the tip of your tongue. There's nothing on it that would cut your tongue--no serrated edges or anything. I just don't get it. It works well and after just a few uses, I feel a world of difference. Give it a shot. You'll love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Alba Resto

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but I expected more
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I had expected magic. I'm one of those people whose tongue is always coated in at least a little bit of white, no matter what. After years of debriding / brushing, I had hoped this would finally rid me of the affliction. It certainly helps, but it's not the magical solution I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Williams III

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what all the hype is about
customer_reviews.text: I take pride in excellent oral hygiene knowing how important it is to my overall health. So, when I found these tongue cleaners and read some pretty impressive reviews about their impact on people's mouths, I ordered a set. I've used mine three times so far, and I am completely underwhelmed. Yeah, junk was removed from my tongue, but the apparatus leaves my tongue feeling dry and fuzzy. No change in color as others have reported. I will be returning this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Useful Addition to Dental Hygiene
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that a tongue scraper would add much beyond simply using a toothbrush after brushing. But after using this for a couple of weeks I concluded it adds enough to justify its continued use.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: This is a gimmick at best.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my family of 6. Everybody used them for a couple of days, and then they ended up in the trash. Not very effective, still caused the gag reflex, make sure you clean several times before using, or you will have a funny / bad taste in your mouth. One time washing will not do it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hatch

customer_reviews.title: More useful than you might think and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Getting a tongue cleaner may not normally be high on your priority list for dental hygiene, but it works surprisingly well and is very gentle on your tongue. I am using a mouth wash that has a somewhat bad aftertaste, so I figured I'd get a tongue scraper to wipe my tongue off rather than using my fingernails. This is a great little gadget for just that purpose, however I was surprised at how great my tongue felt afterward and how pink it is now! Give it a try for yourself - it's pretty inexpensive. I'm recommending them to all my family and friends (most just look at me funny, sigh!).
customer_reviews.author: Z-A

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I love these. I’ve had other tongue scrapers in the past but none seem to work as well as this one. It’s odd and gross but I definitely recommend this tongue scraper!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend for anyone looking to up their hygiene game
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend for anyone looking to up their hygiene game. Wont get into the details of product use but the design is very nice. Most tongue scrapers are plastic, or a wand-style but I like the two handed approach to this. It doesn't scrape or hurt your tongue, just removes any unwanted gunk & helps your breath and overall hygiene. The rubber handles are very comfortable and the stainless steel really is that. Extremely easy to use & clean and an absolute must have for anyone who wants to take that extra step for a cleaner mouth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You don't know how gross your tongue is until you use this!!
customer_reviews.text: My dad gave me this for Christmas (??!) two years ago. Initially, I thought 'what an unnecessary, stupid gift!' But I was dead wrong (okay maybe just don't give it as a Christmas present, maybe a Saint Nick Stocking Stuffer). It gets all that crap off of your tongue that you didn't even know was there. Even if you brush your tongue, you can still take so much off. When you wake up with the occasional Cotton Mouth, this helps SO MUCH. It's so satisfying to scrap all that nasty off of your tongue and look at the difference. Go french kiss your favorite person after buying this. But make sure they have one too.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Do you want your tongue to be cut up and bleed?
customer_reviews.text: This product is HORRIBLE! The first time I used it I cut my tongue. It is very sharp. I don't recommend this at all. And you can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Terezusha

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the plastic tongue scraper I've been using the ...
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the plastic tongue scraper I've been using the past few years, gets way more gunk off of your tongue. If you push too hard the metal can cut your tongue so just be careful and take it easy. Aim for results over time, don't try to get all of gunk off in one night, especially on the back of your tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Briar Lee Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, yet effective.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well; almost too well (cut my tongue a few times). My issue is, the handle fell off of the tongue scraper within a month. I have to constantly push it back on into place. Perhaps the one sent to me was poorly made. Also, DELIVERY TOOK A LOOOOOOOOONG TIME!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Life-changing for me. Seriously
customer_reviews.text: I can get so much gunk off of my tongue by using this! My mouth feels so much cleaner after using the tongue cleaner, breath is much fresher compared to just brushing and using mouthwash. I rarely, if ever, go without using this. This is especially useful for me because I suffer from post-nasal drip when I sleep and this helps me clean all the mucus out in the morning. This along with my neti have really changed my life I ordered this for all of my siblings too and they have told me similar things.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Ghani Memon

customer_reviews.title: This works very well
customer_reviews.text: I have used the plastic/rubber tongue cleaners in the past, but this Stainless Steel model far superior to them. I use this several times a day. It is easy to clean and works very well. It took awhile for me to receive it, but I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Painful and often Bloody (not a rookie)
customer_reviews.text: Scraps the filth off, hurts my tongue. The scraper is just a little too sharp for my tongue. It hurts and I often bleed from minimal use with light pressure. I have tried both sides. One is thinner than the other. Same results. I'll be going back to my previous plastic cleaner. Never bled or had any pain. I have been using these cleaners for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A JOKE!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not a Mr. Tungs product. I've bought a countless number of tongue scrapers by him, but decided this time to order it as I didn't feel like traveling to the store I usually get them from. This morning I went straight in to use it as I would my others, pressing firmly, but this ha my mouth pouring blood from cutting my tongue. I a traumatized. DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: JAYWILL77

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. It took about a week of use to see good results. Ive always had a slight white film on my tongue that brushing alone would not get rid of. Combine this product with good oral hygiene and you cant go wrong. Wish I would of used one of these sooner! I have a healthy looking pink tongue and my breath is always fresh now.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Cutter

customer_reviews.title: This is great and my other one doesn’t even compare
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these - one for my Mom as well. She is using it a lot. I think she has more film on her tongue due to chemo. It’s helping manage all of that. I used a plastic one for YeRs and sorry it took me so long to get this. This is great and my other one doesn’t even compare. Comes w cute tiny cloth carrying bag
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great product, cleans & and is easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first plastic tongue cleaner 20+ years ago when I worked at a local drug store. Many years later the company no longer makes the tongue cleaners so I thought I'd try a stainless steel product instead. Oh WOW. Seriously easy to clean (compared to the occasional scrubbings I'd have to do to the previous cleaners) and it covers a lot more area too. My tongue *gunk* comes right off with the cleaner and washes off just as fast. I'm very happy with the Dr. Tung Tongue Cleaner. When I travel next month I'll use the little travel bag that came with the cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: my mouth has felt so dirty since it's been gone
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this my tongue felt so clean, I used this so often I made my tongue bleed lol. Had to make myself use less often or less vigorously. The first time you see what comes off your tongue, it's so nasty but satisfying. Lost mine during a move and had to reorder one, my mouth has felt so dirty since it's been gone.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Vong

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well-constructed, seems like it'll last a long time, and it scrapes your tongue just fine. What more could you ask from a tongue-scraper? lol! After using it for a couple of months, it does seem to help reduce bad breath. And my mouth feels cleaner. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Danewfixer

customer_reviews.title: Serrated Edge!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a Dr. Tungs scraper before in the past and loved it. This one is not Dr Tungs, made in the Philippines, and literally has a serrated edge. I don’t usually leave reviews because I usually have a good experience with items but considering one gentle scrape made my tongue bleed significantly, I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Carlson

customer_reviews.title: If you smoke, you need this!
customer_reviews.text: Anything that makes your breath stink, smoking, food, etc, probably coats your tongue. This will get that off. It's like a coating of snot. Do you want a coating of snot on your tongue? Of course you don't. Buy this. Get that snot off. You'll thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Morghandi

customer_reviews.title: makes my mouth feel a lot cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than the cheap plastic ones you can buy at the grocery store because this one can be sanitized more easily and creates less waste because you don't have to throw it away when it gets dirty. it also works better than the little plastic ones and scrapes really thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: james w

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this thing
customer_reviews.text: Listen y’all I swear by this thing. I use it probably 2x a week after brushing my teeth and I absolutely love it. My mouth has never been so clean. It just feels cleaner after even one use of this thing and the lasting results are awesome. Even used it while I was sick and it made me feel 100x better. Definitely a necessity if you ask me
customer_reviews.author: Riley M

customer_reviews.title: The most affordable & hygienic option!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so weird, disgusting, fascinating, gross, and great all at the same time to see all the “sludge” that comes off with this. It’s super easy to clean, came in a cute lilac color with a cute bag, and works efficiently. I didn’t go to the extreme of wiping everything off until I was superrrrr pink my first time but with consistent use, I’m getting there!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Samantha Bautista

customer_reviews.title: No gag tongue scraper
customer_reviews.text: I like how far you can go scraping your tongue all the way back to the throat and no gagging. There is a lot of stuff on my tongue daily and this helps freshen it. The delivery time from this seller was not acceptable in this day and age.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy- cuts up your tongue
customer_reviews.text: This took 6 weeks to arrive, so way later than the original date. I’ve been using it once a day and it did seem to be improving my breath. However, it has cut up my tongue and I will no longer be using it. This is painful. These are definitely not safe rogue scrapers.
customer_reviews.author: LLama

customer_reviews.title: Good if you get used to it.
customer_reviews.text: Its very easy to use and a necessity for oral hygiene. its annoying for me at first to control the gag reflex but then I got used to it. Now I use it everyday before going to bed. NOTE : Would have been nice if it had a hard case rather than a fabric pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Fetouh

customer_reviews.title: Effective Tongue Widget
customer_reviews.text: Nothing you couldn’t devise with a little ingenuity from H Depot. Simple to use. Reinforces the perception of general grossness of the human body. Took forever to arrive because it ships from overseas. But it does what it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bill

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do much
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to love this but just didn’t find it particularly effective, and it irritated the little bumps on the back of my tongue. Was hoping for more dramatic results I guess, based on reading all the other reviews
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, why didn't I buy it earlier
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, why didn't I buy it earlier? I ordered two: one for me and one for hubby. We both always have gag reflex whenever we use our toothbrush, but this doesn't make us gag and cleans pretty well. The only thing is hard to store and I don't get to pick the color of the handles. Now I have a blue one and my husband has a purple one.
customer_reviews.author: yeni

customer_reviews.title: Like a Dyson vacuum for your tongue.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a little plastic tongue scraper I got from the dentist. I thought it worked okay. Until I tried this stainless steel cleaner. I was disgusted by everything that came off my tongue. THEN I was pleased by how clean my tongue felt after just one scrape. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing! Prior to buying this, I would normally brush my tongue while brushing my teeth. After getting pregnant, I quickly discovered brushing my tongue makes me throw up... Tongue scraper to the rescue! This little thing is wonderful. My mouth feels clean.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: A bit harsh on my tongue
customer_reviews.text: I get a white coated tongue quite often. Usually scrub and scrub with my toothbrush. I got this, and it's a little too harsh on my tongue. The serrated metal is sharp. I had a bit of bleeding. I'll still try to use it -- I may just have been heavy-handed.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Orrington

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend 100%
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but have heard such great benefits for using one. I use it before I go to bed and notice when I wake up I have little to no morning breath. I have now added it as an essential step to my morning/night routine. As a bonus they include this adorable pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K

customer_reviews.title: Far better than plastic, only make 1-2 passes and stop.
customer_reviews.text: This one works far better than the plastic versions and last forever. Just be caution that you only need 1-2 passes with this one.... first time I did about 6-7 passes and caused a small cut on my tongue because it was just to many passes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fahey

customer_reviews.title: Mouth feels cleaner, breath smells fresher
customer_reviews.text: I saw this recommended by a health blogger on YouTube, so I gave it a try. I've made it a part of my morning routine, and it really does make my mouth feel cleaner. I'm a big coffee drinker, and it definitely helps with my breath, too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: was skeptical initially. good product. i can feel and taste the difference after brushing and using this vs trying to use toothbrush to clean tongue. it can be abrasive if u go beyond circumvallate papillae- may bleed and or induce gagging.
customer_reviews.author: j.

customer_reviews.title: Best tongue scraper for the money
customer_reviews.text: I buy a few of these throughout the year. It’s made out of a very flexible metal that allows you to apply as much or as little pressure as you want. I noticed you tend to apply more and more pressure as you get used to it. We’ll continue to buy for both the reliability and effectiveness. And especially the price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Newton

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I’ve always kept up with my oral hygiene, (especially now with braces) but have never used a tongue scraper before now. This thing is insane. I have a pretty bad gag reflex but this didn’t cause much gagging... I went to town with it instead of using the “repeat 3-4 times” instructions on the back. Might buy more as gag gifts for people that need this at work!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Best Tongue Cleaner ever!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is the BEST tongue cleaner I've ever used (and I've been cleaning my tongue with tongue cleaners for as long as I can remember). If you go too far back on your tongue and press it hard, it might hurt you a little, but all you gotta do is pay attention to the amount of strength you're using. I'd recommend it 1000 times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: it's not like this is a must have item. you can brush your tongue with a toothbrush but this doesn't a good job scraping off the gunk off your tongue with fewer strokes. simple and effective. love those simple tools.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Needs One!
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly skeptical about how such a simple looking tool could make your breath smell better, but boy was I wrong. This tongue cleaner works wonders and eliminates bad breath for about 24 hours granted you don't eat anything smelly like garlic after cleaning. My mouth feels so much more cleaner since buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase took a month to get here. When I received it, it wasn't in a package and was loose in a bag tied with a string. I don't find that acceptable for a tool used for oral cleaning. I wondered why it was so cheap. Should've paid a little more and got the more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: A life changing dental product
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t own a tongue scraper you need to buy this RIGHT NOW. It’s so life changing lol. I used to just simply brush my tongue, but a tongue scraper does a much better job. It feels funny at first and you have to press down hard and scrape to get things off but you get used to it quickly! I typically rinse mine as I scrape with hot water as I gonand then clean it off again when I am finished. I was hoping I would not receive one with pink handles (not that it’s a huge deal), but was pleasantly surprised to get blue with a matching bag.
customer_reviews.author: nikki campisano

product_meta.title: DrTung's Tongue Cleaner, Stainless Steel Tongue Scraper (colors may vary)
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1Modern research confirms that tongue cleaning is the best way to remove bacteria that cause bad breath. Tongue cleansing also helps improve taste, remove the coating on the tongue and slow the growth of plaque. DrTung's Tongue Scraper is the leading tongue cleaner for a reason. Dentists and hygienists use and recommend DrTung's because the high-quality stainless steel used is impervious to bacteria and the effective design is comfortable and gentle on the tongue. Experience a deep yet gentle cleansing
feature_bullets: YOUR BREATH’S FRIEND. Over 1 million sold. DrTung’s tongue cleaner helps remove bacteria and soft plaque in seconds! Gentle on the tongue, easy to use and delivers the best tongue cleaning experience. #1 selling tongue cleaner in the natural industry (ref: SPINSscan Natural Channel, Total US, Oral Care Tools, 52wks 12/31/19)

STAINLESS STEEL: DrTung's tongue scrapers are made from high-grade stainless steel because it is impervious to bacteria, and is more effective, long-lasting, comfortable and gentler on the tongue than a plastic tongue scraper, which can harbor germs.

QUICK, EFFECTIVE AND COMFORTABLE: Get fresher breath and a cleaner mouth in just 10 seconds! DrTung’s iconic curved shape and ergonomic design ensures a pleasant, thorough and comfortable cleaning of your tongue. Experience dental hygiene like never before!

COMFORTABLE GRIP: DrTung's tongue scraper is made with soft and comfortable rubber handles. These and the curved edge give you more control of the precise force and position of the cleaner on the tongue, making it one of the best tongue cleaners in preventing the gag reflex. Comes with bamboo fabric travel/storage pouch.

A CLEANER YOU CAN TRUST: DrTung's is highly regarded as the leading tongue cleaner in the health market. It is sold in health stores and dental offices around the country, and is used and recommended by dentists and hygienists.
